thread.title: Seahawks place CB Simon on IR, promote RB Smith

title: Seahawks place CB Simon on IR, promote RB Smith
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Seahawks place CB Simon on IR, promote RB Smith The Seahawks placed cornerback Tharold Simon in the injured reserve list. Simon might need surgery to fix a dislocated toe Post to Facebook Seahawks place CB Simon on IR, promote RB Smith The Seahawks placed cornerback Tharold Simon in the injured reserve list. Simon might need surgery to fix a dislocated toe  //www.king5.com/story/sports/2015/10/10/seahawks-place-cb-simon-on-ir-promote-rb-smith/73760816/   Join the Conversation To   Seahawks place CB Simon on IR, promote RB Smith 8:01 p.m. PDT October 10, 2015 Aug 7, 2014; Denver, CO, USA; Seattle Seahawks cornerback Tharold Simon (27) hits Denver Broncos tight end Gerell Robinson (89) across his face in the third quarter of a preseason game at Sports Authority Field at Mile High. The Broncos defeated the Seahawks 21-16. Mandatory Credit: Ron Chenoy-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Ron Chenoy-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The Seahawks placed cornerback Tharold Simon in the injured reserve list. Simon might need surgery to fix a dislocated toe. 
Seattle then promoted running back Rod Smith from the practice squad. The Hawks are searching for some depth at RB after declaring Marshawn Lynch out for Sunday's game. Beast Mode is battling a strained hamstring. Plus, Fred Jackson is trying to comeback from a high ankle strain suffered in the Lions game on Monday night. 
Smith ran the ball 10 times in preseason for 70 yards. He also caught six passes for 27 yards. 
Simon's status hurts the defensive backs. Seattle is already down Marcus Burley. He had surgery to fix his broken thumb and won't be back for at least three weeks. Plus, Deshawn Shead is listed as doubtful for Sunday's game with the Bengals. He's battling a hip injury.
